00049 
00050 bool print_pack_info = getenv("print_pack_info");

00054 // NOTE: unlimited max size 
00055 // memory is allocated dynamically in chunks of 
00056 // sc_bv_base(UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE)
00057

00059 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 //
00061 // CLASS: uvm_packer_rep
00062 //
00063 // Internal implementation class.
00064 // uvm_packer delegetates to this class to do the real work.
00065 //

00074 class uvm_packer_rep {
00075 public:
00076   uvm_packer_rep(uvm_packer* packer);
00077   ~uvm_packer_rep();
00078   //
00079   void allocate(int nbits, bool copy = true);
00080   void reset();
00081   void set_size(int nbits);
00082   //
00083   void put_bits(const std::vector<bool>& v);
00084   void get_bits(std::vector<bool>& v);
00085   void put_bytes(const std::vector<char>& v);
00086   void get_bytes(std::vector<char>& v);
00087   void put_ints(const std::vector<int>& v);
00088   void get_ints(std::vector<int>& v);
00089   void put_uints(const std::vector<unsigned int>& v);
00090   void pack_obj_header(const std::string & type_name);
00091   void get_uints(std::vector<unsigned int>& v);
00092   void * unpack_obj_header();
00093   bool check_obj_header();
00094   //
00095   bool use_metadata() const { return m_use_metadata; }
00096   void use_metadata(bool b) { m_use_metadata = b; }
00097   //
00098   void check_size(int nbits);
00099 
00100   //
00101   void pack_non_null();
00102   bool unpack_non_null();
00103   void pack_null();

00105   void pack_int_n(uint64 k, unsigned nbits);
00106   uint64 unpack_int_n(unsigned nbits);
00107   //
00108   void pack_char(char);
00109   void unpack_char(char&);
00110   //
00111   void pack_string(std::string s);

00114   void pack_obj(uvm_object*);

00120   void unpack_sc_bv_base(sc_bv_base&);

00122   void unpack_sc_lv_base(sc_lv_base&);
00123   void pack_sc_int_base(const sc_int_base&);
00124   void unpack_sc_int_base(sc_int_base&);

00126   void unpack_sc_uint_base(sc_uint_base&);

00129   void pack_sc_unsigned(const sc_unsigned&);
00130   void unpack_sc_unsigned(sc_unsigned&);
00131   //
00132   unsigned get_remaining_unpacked_bits() { return pack_index - unpack_index; }
00133   int get_size() { return size; }
00134   sc_bv_base* get_packed_bits() { return m_bits; }
00135   int get_pack_index() const { return pack_index; }
00136   void set_pack_index(int n) { pack_index = n; }
00137 private:

00139 private:
00140   uvm_packer* m_packer;

00142   unsigned pack_index;
00143   unsigned unpack_index;
00144 
00145   sc_bv_base* m_bits;
00146   int size;
00147   int max_size;

00154 uvm_packer_rep::uvm_packer_rep(uvm_packer* packer) {
00155   //cout << "in packer ctor " << endl;
00156   m_packer = packer;
00157   m_use_metadata = false;
00158 
00159   pack_index = 0;
00160   unpack_index = 0;
00161 
00162   size = 0;
00163   max_size = 0;
00164   m_bits = 0;
00165 }
00166 
00167 uvm_packer_rep::~uvm_packer_rep() {
00168   //cout << "in packer dtor " << endl;
00169   if (m_bits)
00170     delete m_bits;
00171 }
00172 
00173 void uvm_packer_rep::allocate(int nbits, bool copy_) {
00174   // allocate new sc_bv_base with new size, and copy over contents from
00175   // old sc_bv_base
00176 
00177   int total_bits = pack_index + nbits;
00178   int new_size = 
00179     ((total_bits - 1)/UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE + 1) * UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE;
00180 #ifdef _NCSC_DEBUG
00181   assert((new_size % UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE) == 0);
00182 #endif
00183   size = new_size;
00184   if (size > max_size) { // need to allocate
00185     max_size = size;
00186     sc_bv_base* new_bv = new sc_bv_base(size);
00187     if (m_bits) {
00188       if (copy_) { 
00189         *new_bv = *m_bits;
00190       }
00191       delete m_bits;
00192     }
00193     m_bits = new_bv;
00194   }
00195 }
00196   
00197 void uvm_packer_rep::set_size(int nbits) {
00198   // check that we are in a "fresh" packer, e.g. one that has been reset
00199 #ifdef _NCSC_DEBUG  
00200   assert(size == 0);
00201   assert(pack_index == 0);
00202 #endif
00203   // no need to copy over from old sc_bv_base
00204   allocate(nbits, false);  
00205 }
00206 
00207 void uvm_packer_rep::reset() {
00208 
00209   pack_index = 0;
00210   unpack_index = 0;
00211   size = 0;
00212 }
00213 
00214 void uvm_packer_rep::inc_unpack_index(int n) {
00215   unpack_index += n;
00216   if (unpack_index > pack_index) {
00217     char msg[1024];
00218     sprintf(msg,"unpack_index=%d, pack_index=%d",unpack_index,pack_index);
00219     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_INDEX_,msg);
00220   }
00221 }
00222 
00224 
00225 // put_xxx() and get_xxx() are internal uvm_packer member methods
00226 // called from the user-visible API in uvm_object:
00227 // pack_bits, pack_bytes(), pack_ints(), and
00228 // unpack_bits(), unpack_bytes(), unpack_ints()
00229 
00230 // put_xxx() is just like packing, including incrementing the packing index;
00231 // get_xxx() is not like unpacking - all the info is extracted into the 
00232 // given vector, but unpacking index is not incremented
00233   
00234 void uvm_packer_rep::put_bits(const std::vector<bool>& v) {
00235   reset();
00236   int n = v.size();
00237   set_size(n);
00238   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00239     (*m_bits)[i] = v[i];
00240   }
00241   pack_index = n;
00242 }
00243 
00244 void uvm_packer_rep::get_bits(std::vector<bool>& v) {
00245   unsigned n = get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00246   for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00247     bool b = (*m_bits)[i].to_bool();
00248     v.push_back(b);
00249   }
00250 }
00251 
00252 void uvm_packer_rep::put_bytes(const std::vector<char>& v) {
00253   reset();
00254   int n = v.size();
00255   set_size(n*8);
00256   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00257     (*m_bits).range(8*i+7,8*i) = v[i];
00258   }
00259   pack_index = 8*n;
00260 }
00261 
00262 void uvm_packer_rep::get_bytes(std::vector<char>& v) {
00263   unsigned n = get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00264   unsigned nbytes = 1 + (n-1)/8;
00265   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nbytes; i++) {
00266     char b = (*m_bits).range(8*i+7,8*i).to_int();
00267     v.push_back(b);
00268   }
00269 }
00270 
00271 void uvm_packer_rep::put_ints(const std::vector<int>& v) {
00272   reset();
00273   int n = v.size();
00274   set_size(n*32);
00275   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00276     (*m_bits).range(32*i+31,32*i) = v[i];
00277   }
00278   pack_index = 32*n;
00279 }
00280 
00281 void uvm_packer_rep::get_ints(std::vector<int>& v) {
00282   unsigned n = get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00283   unsigned nints = 1 + (n-1)/32;
00284   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nints; i++) {
00285     int b = (*m_bits).range(32*i+31,32*i).to_int();
00286     v.push_back(b);
00287   }
00288 }
00289 
00290 void uvm_packer_rep::put_uints(const std::vector<unsigned int>& v) {
00291   reset();
00292   int n = v.size();
00293   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00294     (*m_bits).range(32*i+31,32*i) = v[i];
00295   }
00296   pack_index = 32*n;
00297 }
00298 
00299 void uvm_packer_rep::get_uints(std::vector<unsigned int>& v) {
00300   unsigned n = get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00301   unsigned nints = 1 + (n-1)/32;
00302   //cout << "n = " << n << endl;
00303   //cout << "nints = " << nints << endl;
00304   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nints; i++) {
00305     int b = (*m_bits).range(32*i+31,32*i).to_uint();
00306     v.push_back(b);
00307   }
00308 }
00309 
00310 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_obj_header(const std::string & type_name) 
00311 {
00312   pack_non_null();
00313   pack_string(type_name);
00314 }
00315 
00316 void * uvm_packer_rep::unpack_obj_header() 
00317 {
00318   if (!use_metadata()) {
00319     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_UNPACK_OBJ_NO_METADATA_,"");
00320     return NULL;
00321   }
00322   std::string s;
00323   if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00324     if (print_pack_info) {
00325       cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00326     }
00327     return NULL;
00328   }
00329   unpack_string(s);
00330   void *obj = NULL;
00331   string base_class_str;
00332   if (uvm_factory::is_uvm_object_registered(s)) {
00333     base_class_str = "uvm_object";
00334     obj = (void *) uvm_factory::create_uvm_object(s,"","",true);
00335   } else if (uvm_factory::is_class_registered(s)) {
00336     base_class_str = "tlm_generic_payload";
00337     obj = uvm_factory::create_registered_class(s);
00338   }
00339   else {
00340     char msg[1024];
00341     sprintf(msg,"Unpack uvm_object failed. Type = %s",s.c_str());
00342     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00343     return NULL;
00344   }
00345   return obj;
00346 }
00347 
00348 bool uvm_packer_rep::check_obj_header() 
00349 {
00350   bool result;
00351   unsigned unpack_index_sav = unpack_index;
00352 
00353   if (!use_metadata()) {
00354     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_UNPACK_OBJ_NO_METADATA_,"");
00355     result = false;
00356   } else {
00357     if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00358       if (print_pack_info) {
00359         cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00360       }
00361       result = false;
00362     }
00363 
00364     std::string s;
00365     unpack_string(s);
00366 
00367     result = (((uvm_factory::is_uvm_object_registered(s)) || (uvm_factory::is_class_registered(s))) ? true : false);
00368   }
00369   unpack_index = unpack_index_sav;
00370   return result;
00371 }
00372 
00374 
00375 void uvm_packer_rep::check_size(int nbits) {
00376   int capacity = size - pack_index;
00377   if (nbits >= capacity) {
00378     allocate(nbits);
00379   }
00380 }
00381 
00382 // put a 8-bit 1 meaning non-null for uvm_objects
00383 
00384 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_non_null() {
00385   int nbits = 8;
00386   check_size(nbits);
00387   (*m_bits)(pack_index + nbits - 1, pack_index) = 1;
00388   pack_index += nbits;
00389   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_non_null " << endl;
00390 }
00391 
00392 // put 8-bit 0 meaning null for uvm_objects
00393 
00394 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_null() {
00395   int nbits = 8;
00396   check_size(nbits);
00397   (*m_bits)(pack_index + nbits - 1, pack_index) = 0;
00398   pack_index += nbits;
00399   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_null " << endl;
00400 }
00401 
00402 bool uvm_packer_rep::unpack_non_null() {
00403   int nbits = 8;
00404   int a = (*m_bits)(unpack_index + nbits - 1, unpack_index).to_int();
00405   inc_unpack_index(nbits);
00406   if (!a) { 
00407     if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_non_null FALSE " << endl;
00408     return false;
00409   }
00410   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_non_null true " << endl;
00411   return true;
00412 }
00413 
00415 
00416 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_char(char a) {
00417   int nbits = 8;
00418   check_size(nbits);
00419   (*m_bits)(pack_index + nbits - 1, pack_index) = a;
00420   pack_index += nbits;
00421   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_char " << a << endl;
00422 }
00423 
00424 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_char(char& a) {
00425   unsigned nbits = 8;
00426   a = (*m_bits)(unpack_index + nbits - 1, unpack_index).to_int();
00427   inc_unpack_index(nbits);
00428   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_char -> " << a << endl;
00429 }
00430 
00432 
00433 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_int_n(unsigned long long a, unsigned nbits) {
00434   check_size(nbits);
00435   (*m_bits)(pack_index + nbits - 1, pack_index) = a;
00436   pack_index += nbits;
00437   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_int_n " << a 
00438     << " " << nbits << endl;
00439 }
00440 
00441 uint64 uvm_packer_rep::unpack_int_n(unsigned nbits) {
00442   uint64 a;
00443   a = (*m_bits)(unpack_index + nbits - 1, unpack_index).to_uint64();
00444   inc_unpack_index(nbits);
00445   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_int_n " 
00446     << nbits << " -> " << a << endl;
00447   return a;
00448 }
00449 
00450 // after packing a string, pack a null byte at the end 
00451 
00452 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_string(std::string a) {
00453   int nchars = a.length();
00454   for (int i = 0; i < nchars; i++) {
00455     pack_char(a[i]);
00456   }
00457   pack_char(0);
00458   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_string " << a << endl;
00459 }
00460 
00461 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_string(std::string& a) {
00462   a = "";
00463   std::string cs;
00464   while (1) {
00465     char c;
00466     unpack_char(c);
00467     if (!c) break;
00468     cs = c;
00469     a = a + cs;
00470   }
00471   if (print_pack_info) 
00472     cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_string: " << a << endl;
00473 }
00474 
00475 // metadata affects how a nested uvm_object is packed.
00476 // if metadata is included, then before packing the uvm_object, pack 2
00477 // additional items:
00478 // 1) 8 bits set to 1 if the uvm_object is non-null, and set 
00479 // to 0 if uvm_object is null
00480 // 2) the string name of the uvm_object, as returned by get_type_name()
00481 
00482 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_obj(uvm_object* a) {
00483   if (use_metadata()) {
00484     if (!a) {
00485       if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_obj packing null"
00486         << endl;
00487       pack_null();
00488       return;
00489     }
00490     pack_obj_header(a->get_type_name());
00491   }
00492   if (!a) {
00493     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACK_NULL_,"");
00494     return;
00495   }
00496   a->pack(*m_packer);
00497   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_obj " 
00498     << a->get_type_name() << endl;
00499 }
00500 
00501 // metadata affects how a nested uvm_object is unpacked.
00502 // metadata must have been packed during the corresponding packing
00503 // operation, as the packer allocates/creates the uvm_object from the
00504 // factory using the packed type name.
00505 // if metadata was not packed, then the packer errors out.
00506 
00507 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_obj(uvm_object*& a) {
00508   if (!use_metadata()) {
00509     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_UNPACK_OBJ_NO_METADATA_,"");
00510     a = 0;
00511     return;
00512   }
00513   std::string s;
00514   if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00515     if (print_pack_info) {
00516       cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00517     }
00518     a = 0;
00519     return;
00520   }
00521   unpack_string(s);
00522   //unsigned id = 0;
00523   //unpack_int_n(id, 8*sizeof(id));
00524   //s = uvm_get_type_name(id);
00525   uvm_object* obj = uvm_factory::create_uvm_object(s,"","",true);
00526   if (!obj) {
00527     char msg[1024];
00528     sprintf(msg,"Unpack uvm_object failed. Type = %s",s.c_str());
00529     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00530     return;
00531   }
00532   obj->unpack(*m_packer);
00533   a = obj;
00534   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_obj " << endl;
00535 }
00536 
00537 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_logic(const sc_logic& a) {
00538   check_size(1);
00539   (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, a.value());
00540   pack_index++;
00541 }
00542 
00543 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_logic(sc_logic& a) {
00544   sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00545   a = val;
00546   inc_unpack_index(1);
00547 }
00548 
00549 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_bv_base(const sc_bv_base& a) {
00550   int nbits = a.length();
00551   check_size(nbits);
00552   (*m_bits)(pack_index + nbits - 1, pack_index) = a;
00553   pack_index += nbits;
00554 }
00555 
00556 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_bv_base(sc_bv_base& a) {
00557   int nbits = a.length();
00558   a = (*m_bits)(unpack_index + nbits - 1, unpack_index);
00559   inc_unpack_index(nbits);
00560 }
00561 
00562 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_lv_base(const sc_lv_base& a) {
00563   int n = a.length();
00564   check_size(n);
00565   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00566     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = a.get_bit(i);
00567     (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, val);
00568     pack_index++;
00569   }
00570 }
00571 
00572 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_lv_base(sc_lv_base& a) {
00573   int n = a.length();
00574   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00575     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00576     a.set_bit(i, val);
00577     unpack_index++;
00578   }
00579 }
00580 
00581 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_int_base(const sc_int_base& a) {
00582   int n = a.length();
00583   check_size(n);
00584   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00585     bool val = a.test(i);
00586     if (val) {
00587       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_1);
00588     } else {
00589       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_0);
00590     }
00591     pack_index++;
00592   }
00593 }
00594 
00595 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_int_base(sc_int_base& a) {
00596   int n = a.length();
00597   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00598     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00599     if (int(val) == int(sc_dt::Log_1)) {
00600       a.set(i, true);
00601     } else {
00602       a.set(i, false);
00603     }
00604     unpack_index++;
00605   }
00606 }
00607 
00608 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_uint_base(const sc_uint_base& a) {
00609   int n = a.length();
00610   check_size(n);
00611   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00612     bool val = a.test(i);
00613     if (val) {
00614       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_1);
00615     } else {
00616       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_0);
00617     }
00618     pack_index++;
00619   }
00620 }
00621 
00622 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_uint_base(sc_uint_base& a) {
00623   int n = a.length();
00624   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00625     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00626     if (int(val) == int(sc_dt::Log_1)) {
00627       a.set(i, true);
00628     } else {
00629       a.set(i, false);
00630     }
00631     unpack_index++;
00632   }
00633 }
00634 
00635 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_signed(const sc_signed& a) {
00636   int n = a.length();
00637   check_size(n);
00638   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00639     bool val = a.test(i);
00640     if (val) {
00641       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_1);
00642     } else {
00643       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_0);
00644     }
00645     pack_index++;
00646   }
00647 }
00648 
00649 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_signed(sc_signed& a) {
00650   int n = a.length();
00651   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00652     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00653     if (int(val) == int(sc_dt::Log_1)) {
00654       a.set(i, true);
00655     } else {
00656       a.set(i, false);
00657     }
00658     unpack_index++;
00659   }
00660 }
00661 
00662 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_unsigned(const sc_unsigned& a) {
00663   int n = a.length();
00664   check_size(n);
00665   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00666     bool val = a.test(i);
00667     if (val) {
00668       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_1);
00669     } else {
00670       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_0);
00671     }
00672     pack_index++;
00673   }
00674 }
00675 
00676 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_unsigned(sc_unsigned& a) {
00677   int n = a.length();
00678   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00679     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00680     if (int(val) == int(sc_dt::Log_1)) {
00681       a.set(i, true);
00682     } else {
00683       a.set(i, false);
00684     }
00685     unpack_index++;
00686   }
00687 }

00697   m_rep->use_metadata(false);

00755 
00756 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (bool a) { 
00757   int i = a ? 1 : 0;
00758   m_rep->pack_int_n(i,1);
00759   return *this;
00760 }
00761 
00762 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (bool& a) { 
00763   a = (bool)(m_rep->unpack_int_n(1));
00764   return *this;
00765 }
00766 
00768 
00769 #define def_pack_int_operators(T) \
00770 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (T a) { \
00771   m_rep->pack_int_n(a,8*sizeof(T));\
00772   return *this;\
00773 } \
00774 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (T& a) {  \
00775   a = (T)(m_rep->unpack_int_n(8*sizeof(T))); \
00776   return *this; \
00777 }
00778 
00779 typedef unsigned char uchar;
00780 typedef unsigned short ushort;
00781 typedef unsigned int uint;
00782 typedef unsigned long ulong;
00783 
00784 def_pack_int_operators(char)
00785 def_pack_int_operators(uchar)
00786 def_pack_int_operators(short)
00787 def_pack_int_operators(ushort)
00788 def_pack_int_operators(int)
00789 def_pack_int_operators(uint)
00790 def_pack_int_operators(long)
00791 def_pack_int_operators(ulong)
00792 def_pack_int_operators(int64)
00793 def_pack_int_operators(uint64)

00796 
00797 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (const char* a) { 
00798   if (!a) {
00799     m_rep->pack_string("");
00800   } else {
00801     m_rep->pack_string(a);
00802   }
00803   return *this;
00804 }
00805 
00806 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (std::string a) { 
00807   m_rep->pack_string(a);
00808   return *this;
00809 }
00810 
00811 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (std::string& a) { 
00812   m_rep->unpack_string(a);
00813   return *this;
00814 }
00815 
00816 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (uvm_object* a) {
00817   m_rep->pack_obj(a);
00818   return *this;
00819 }
00820 
00821 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (uvm_object*& a) {
00822   m_rep->unpack_obj(a);
00823   return *this;
00824 }
00825 
00826 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (const uvm_object& a) {
00827   m_rep->pack_obj((uvm_object*)(&a));
00828   return *this;
00829 }

00831 #define def_pack_sctype_operators(T) \
00832 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (const T& a) { \
00833   m_rep->pack_##T(a);\
00834   return *this;\
00835 } \
00836 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (T& a) {  \
00837   m_rep->unpack_##T(a); \
00838   return *this; \
00839 }
